SEARCH
Package com.example.atlasevents

Class FakeEventRepository

java.lang.Object
com.example.atlasevents.data.EventRepository
com.example.atlasevents.FakeEventRepository
public class FakeEventRepository extends EventRepository
Fake EventRepository for testing purposes. Stores events in memory instead of using Firestore.

  • Nested Class Summary

    • searchEventsByKeyword

      public void searchEventsByKeyword(String searchQuery, EventRepository.EventsCallback callback)
      Description copied from class: EventRepository
      Searches events using the precomputed searchKeywords field (name and tags prefixes). The query is normalized to lowercase and must be at least two characters long.
      Overrides:
      searchEventsByKeyword in class EventRepository
      Parameters:
      searchQuery - partial search text from the UI
      callback - callback to deliver matching events
